title: Episode 21: The Cleveland Strangler
description:
Neighbors thought the terrible smell was from the local sausage factory. Anthony Sowell tried to convince people it was from his elderly mother. But the real explanation was that Sowell, aka The Cleveland Strangler, had 11 decomposing bodies stashed around his house. This week's episode is The Cleveland Strangler.

itunes:subtitle: This is one House of Horrors you do NOT want to visit on Halloween.
